- Pros:
Very very very fun game to play, and even better with friends.
Each game takes a really short time, so it won't force you stuck at the table for too long.
The game updates pretty frequently, keeping the gameplay fresh.
The game is great by itself; it doesn't require players to buy dlc to enjoy.  

- Cons: 
The game has some bugs, though they don't often appear. Also, it takes quite a long time for the developer to fix bugs.
A portion of the community is very toxic.

This game has been out for 7 years and they still can't fix core issues with the game forgetting balance entirely. Infinite loading screens and sped up particle effects post game have been around for several years. Bloodweb has long since been a grindy mess that their shoddy events don't relieve. Search function for the hundreds of perks STILL don't exist. No in-game way to easily analyse what key words like Mangle & Hemorrhage actually do. An FOV slider is still locked to 2 killer perks for some inane reason, just play with 1 less perk if you get motion sick from the horribly zoomed in 1st person camera lol 4head.

Instead of buying this game, I suggest you look into VHS or the Ash vs the Evil Dead game to fill your asym. needs.

Después de jugar este juego por tanto tiempo y ver lo que es ahora me hubiera gustado no haberlo comprado y con ese dinero haber jugado otros. F. Que el juego sea asimétrico (4vs1) hace que la mayoría de los jugadores sea de un bando y los devs escuchen a ese bando, si no te gusta los devs literalmente te dicen que juegues otra cosa. 

Es gracioso porque en los trailers no ves que el atractivo del juego sean 4 tipos reparando sino siempre ponen al killer en los trailers pero a los killers les dicen que vayan a jugar otra cosa.

Enserio no lo vale. Compren otros juegos con el dinero que van a usar en este gente. No se dejen llevar porque hay un asesino del que son fan, al final solo te van a bullear tu asesino favorito 4 tipos x.

5 cosas:
- Buen progreso, mucho contenido y planean agregar aun más.
- Son conscientes cuando las cosas no están balanceadas e intentan corregirlo sin perder el foco en lo divertido (de vez en cuando exageran, legión te estoy mirando).
- Del lado survivor, muy recomendado para jugadores casuales. Del lado killer, un poco estresante pero no pierde la gracia.
- Recomiendo jugar Civ VI cuando empieces a frustrarte.

Se lo recomiendo a todos mis amigos y conocidos. Y a tu vieja.

Great game, very atmospheric and fun to play for both the killer and survivors. Perk system allows for some customization and the gameplay loop (looping tiles, hiding, etc) is fun enough that the game doesn't get stale. Devs constantly adding new content and do a pretty good job of communicating (as of late) with players, even when things aren't going well. 9/10, would easily recommend if you like horror games and want a multiplayer experience with it.
Its great to play with friends and scream as your being chased by the killer into their ears through Discord.

I was initially very fond of this game, but after a few 100 hours or so... I feel that it's lacking a lot in terms of balance and replayability.  At first, the anticipation and horror of the game is pretty solid if you don't know much about the killers or environments.  However, once you've become accustomed to the mechanics, the game becomes a grind fest.

The majority of my playtime has been as a survivor and playing with a group of friends.  This isn't exactly how you're suppose to play the game as I do believe it can be unfair to the Killer if survivors are allowed to feed information to their teammates they wouldn't normally have (with or without perks), but with my skill level, I don't think I could enjoy this game any other way.  

The saying "git gud or uninstall" is pretty much sacred here.  Most of my matches result in maybe 5,000 bps if I haven't been tunneled or camped on first hook.  Even the games I think I've played very well don't net me much, either.  And I understand the major issue is with me and my lack of skill in pvp environments.  That being said, I don't think a lot of people would enjoy this game if their intention is to rank up, escape/4k moderately often.

I would like to add, however, that I've only rarely dealt with long loading ques (from 10 minutes and up), but I do often play on weekends with 4-5 friends, so that may affect this.

All in all, the game is very buggy and unbalanced.  The developers are showing signs of trying to alleviate the unbalance, but I'm uncertain if the bugs will every truly be fixed.  I want to wait for the new matchmaking system as I feel killer and survivor matches are never quite fair on either end.
Depending on which side you play you may get some of the nicest people or the most toxic but the grind of trying to get better is the best of most games I have played
Game is amaze-balls.  Great fun, great balance, fun with friends, fun solo.  Plenty of replay value and fun community.

Me encantan los eventos! super divertidos y es muy fácil de completarlos para ganar espectaculares recompensas!! Mentira. Los eventos son una bija, se ve que los devs son 2 monchos laburando por el mínimo sueldo porque te publican el evento de navidad el 4 de enero y las recompensas son una bazofia. Igulamente el juego está mucho más jugable que hace un par de años. Por fin estos ((( ))) abrieron la billetera y garparon servers dedicados y se hizo muchisimo más jugable, aunque las pataditas de mula por lag todavía andan dando vueltas.
Hay una buena cantidad de personajes, eso es piola, aunque algunos están totalmente al pedo. Dicen que hay una loca que vomita y un freddy krueger pero aparecen una vez cada 90 partidas.
A pesar de el rank reset todos los 13 de cada mes (tenes que jugar como un enfermo para poder llegar de level 10 a lvl 1 todos los meses) y de algun personaje facecampero nefasto es el juego más divertido de los que tengo y no paro de cagarme de risotto con mis amigos cada vez que le damos wacha.
Compralo, no seas ortiva
